casey.name: Casey
casey.full_bio: Community development focus working in the Cariboo region on Secw√©pemc, T≈ùilhqot'in, and Dakelh territories. Asks 'how does this serve people like us?' and 'what are we learning from other rural innovators?' Interested in digital equity and Indigenous-led innovation.
